name: DailySignal
text:
It is a discredit to modern Americans that we are now undoing the almost miraculous process of restoration achieved by men who had far more reason to hate.

This is what is lost in the blind efforts to remove statues and American history: https://t.co/tHGKE6Zb3h

name: DailySignal
text:

Many laughed.

He was right: A statue of George Washington was torn down last night in Portland, Oregon. https://t.co/NLUstbLzSl https://t.co/emEn2NIQ7f

As America works toward bringing the #COVID19 pandemic under control, it is vital that the public and leaders make smart and informed decisions.

To that end, @heritage @covid19recovery has released its final report: https://t.co/93lqYPOkps

text:

Kate Anderson, an attorney with @AllianceDefends joins the Problematic Women podcast to discuss what this #SCOTUS decision means for women all over America: https://t.co/ICSC9E2SMS
